mapper.select: select province_code as `value`, `name` as `label` from `province` order by province_code asc
select city_code as `value`, `name` as `label` from `city` where province_code = #{privinceCode} order by city_code asc
select area_code as `value`, `name` as `label` from `area` where city_code = #{cityCode} order by area_code asc
select street_code as `value`, `name` as `label` from `street` where area_code = #{areaCode} order by street_code asc
select `id` as `value`, `name` as `label`, `detail_location` as `detailLocation` from `community` where street_code = #{streetCode} order by id asc
